price: Und Wir erretteten ihn und Lut in das Land, das Wir für (all) die Weltenbewohner gesegnet haben.
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
